name: Sample Images
author: Leandro Berg

sections.description: This plugin can be used for staging version website for example. Sometimes, developers have to make a staging version just to perform some updates and don’t want to transfer all media content from the “wp-content/uploads” folder. With Sample Images plugin, there’s no necessity for that. Just activate it and all required images in your theme, will receive a sample image without any changes on your db or theme codes.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/sample-images directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. That’s all.

short_description: Runtime media path replacement, used for generate sample images on front side, without any db changes
